remarks.p: This Windows Runtime type corresponds to the D2D Scale effect.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.ScaleEffect.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the ScaleEffect class.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.ScaleEffect.Dispose
member.summary: Releases all resources used by the ScaleEffect.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.ScaleEffect.Source
member.summary: Gets or sets the input source for Scale effect.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.ScaleEffect.Sharpness
member.summary: When using high quality cubic interpolation mode, specifies the sharpness level of the scaling filter as a float between 0 and 1.
member.remarks: You can use sharpness to adjust the quality of image scaling. The sharpness factor affects the shape of the filter kernel. The higher the sharpness factor, the smaller the kernel.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.ScaleEffect.CenterPoint
member.summary: Point to scale around. Default value (0,0).

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.ScaleEffect.BorderMode
member.summary: Border mode for edge pixels. Default value .

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.ScaleEffect.EffectId
member.summary: Gets the unique identifier for the effect.

remarks.p: Generic way to query the type of an effect. EffectId is equal to the CLSID_D2D1Scale GUID specified in the SDK header d2d1effects.h.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.ScaleEffect.Inputs
member.summary: Gets a collection of inputs attached to the effect.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.ScaleEffect.Properties
member.summary: Gets the collection of properties specific to the current effect.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.ScaleEffect.GetBounds(Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.CanvasDrawingSession)
member.summary: Retrieves the bounds of this CanvasImage, in device-independent units. These bounds are the area the image would fill if it were drawn at target offset (0, 0), and identity transform on the specified drawing session.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.ScaleEffect.GetBounds(Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.CanvasDrawingSession,Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Numerics.Matrix3x2)
member.summary: Retrieves the bounds of the CanvasImage, in device-independent units. These bounds are the area the image would fill if it were drawn at target offset (0, 0) with the specified transform transform on the specified drawing session.
